BSidesLuanda

Stay tuned we are setting up, Event comming soon to Luanda - Angola.

About BSidesLuanda

Security BSidesLDA is a regional Security B-Sides held in Luanda. It operates under the umbrella principles of Security B-Sides as a larger community project within information security.Each Security B-Sides is a community-driven framework for building events for, and by, information security practitioners.The goal is to expand the spectrum of conversation beyond the traditional confines of space and time. It creates opportunities for individuals to both present and participate in an intimate atmosphere that encourages collaboration. It is an intense event with discussions, demos, and interaction from participants. It is where conversations for the next-big-thing are happening.

    Contact

    The BSidesLuanda is brought to you by a great team passionate with experience exchange.

    Security BSides Luanda is a Information Security event "..from the community, for the community"! If you would like to participate in our efforts to bring this event in Luanda, just express your interest by sending us an email. People who would like to volunteer can send an email to the staff email. We welcome your help, contribution and participation. Stay tuned!.
